title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - What's new in AWS cost Optimization (COP202)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 成本优化新功能 (COP202)
abstract: Discover the latest advancements in AWS cost optimization strategies and tools designed to help you operate cost-effectively while maintaining high performance. AWS continues to enhance its suite of management tools that monitor resource performance and costs, while providing recommendations for rightsizing and optimizing purchasing decisions. Join us to stay current with the latest best practices and tools for managing your AWS spending efficiently.
abstract_cn: 探索AWS成本优化策略和工具的最新进展，这些策略和工具旨在帮助您在保持高性能的同时实现经济高效的运营。AWS持续增强其管理工具套件，这些工具可监控资源性能和成本，同时为资源调整和优化采购决策提供建议。加入我们，及时了解管理AWS支出的最新最佳实践和工具。
